Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Chicago

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays at Howard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Laramie/Ferdinand

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Chicago, Central, Washington, and Laramie due to street blockage near Laramie/Ferdinand.
